7.28.17  10:59 pm   You've said a few times that you want more keyboard shortcuts. Have you ever heard of the program/programming language AutoHotkey? It allows you to write your own hotkey scripts that can do just about anything on your computer including clicking in specific spots and such. Thought I'd mention it in case it helps you.

7.28.17  10:04 pm   When making your videos, do you usually come up with the music ideas (like the background music or "incidental music" that plays through the video, not just the jingles) at the same time you're working on the script? Or do you usually start the music side of things after coming up with the words? Btw i love the jingles, but that incidental music (or whatever you want to call it) is too good man.

7.28.17  12:25 pm   Lately when I look at the piano, I just see keys. The music used to write itself and everything felt just right. How do I get my creativity back?

7.28.17  12:23 pm   Hey, I was thinkin bout music genres... I can't decide if they exist or not. I think there are distinct styles of music.. but just cause these styles exist doesn't mean that every band or artist can/should be categorized by these labels. There's plenty of music that blurs the lines, and plenty of music that doesn't really line up with any particular style.  On the other hand though, there are a lot of bands/artists that do identify with a specific genre or style cause it has some kind of significance to them... I think there's musicians who are proud to say "I play blues music" or "I play punk rock" or "I play reggae" or whatever...  what do you think? Are genres completely, 100% non-existant? Why or why not?

7.28.17  6:01 am   You said that it's okay that some relationships fail because the artist needs to make his work the top priority. Yet in one of your songs you say, and I quote, "if love is really anything then it's gotta be everything". Does that mean that a) you didn't follow your own advice or b) love isn't really anything, since you didn't make it your everything?
